resources.string: Favorited image added to your gallery.
This made my day. I hope it makes yours too!

string-array.name: texts
string-array.item: Your eyes are blue like the crystal waterfall
You make cheesy bread taste like a gourmet meal
I love you. Happy Birthday! You make me feel so lucky!
You can make anyone anywhere smile with your smile
Keep being you!
If we were in \'The Hunger Games,\' could I be on your team?
You have a great way with words
You warm my heart
You make working on any project a joy
You are very creative
You are fun to be with
You make a house feel like a home
You have a good eye for decorating
You can do anything you set your mind to
You are capable of accomplishing whatever you believe
You are a great listener
You are a terrific leader
You are important to me
You have a terrific outlook on life
You sing like an angel
You are very handsome/beautiful
You are super intelligent and a gentle soul
You are a good role model
You are soo funny
You always motivate me
You are courageous and very loving
You are stronger than you know
You bring out the best in me
You make me want to be a better person
You make me feel I can do anything
You are a wonderful caregiver
You make me feel special
You are the wind beneath my wings
You are fun to be with
You make me smile
You are the light of my life
You smell better than sunshine on a cold day
You are so sharp!
You are so grounded
Good thing you\'re in my life!
If it was rocky road ice cream or you, it\'d be YOU
You\'re contagious....contagiously awesome!
Every person is beautiful. Sometimes it just takes the right people to see it
When someone leaves, it\'s because someone else is about to arrive
Have a great day
You are amazing!
Just smile, you can do it!
Your voice sounds so beautiful
You don\'t need any make-up \'cos you\'re already perfect

Nothing can stop you now
You are so strong!

I love the way you move
Your passion is contagious
Nothing can stop you now
You smell like heaven

You are the best!

You have an amazing imagination

Your eyes are so beautiful!
You are a great friend!
I knew you could do it!
You are meaningful in this universe
You are gonna be someone important
You are the world to someone
Just seeing you smile, brightens up anyone\'s day. Smile more!
You are so thoughtful
Every time I see you, I learn something new
You inspire everyone
Your enthusiasm is contagious
You know the girl/guy you like, yeah they are thinking about you right now
